channel.title: Teleport After Death
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm using a devolution 7.0 server source and i would like all help, examples, tutorials, advice on how to make it so if you die in a certain area you get teleported to a certain place instead of yanille (falador in my case).
All help is appreciated.
Thanx!
Also even the layout of the piece of code would be great as i'm not experiences with area co-ords.

item.title: Teleport After Death
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Ok when you die you go to yanille co ords no matter where you die. When i die in castle wars i still go to yanille i want to go to the waiting area. So lets say, errrr, the yanille co ords were 1111 1111 and castle wars were 9999 9999 if i search for 1111 ( yanille) and change to 9999 ( castlewars) where ever i die i will always go to castlewars if i did that so if i died in wildy id go to castle wars and i dont want that i only want you to go to castlewars if you die and your in the castle wars vicinity.

Sorry bout gettin worked up but this is hard to explain and i really do appreciate the help

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport After Death
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Oh my fucking god.

What do you want?

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport After Death
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

FFS NO THAT WILL CHNAGE IT SO YOU GO TO WAITING ROOM EVERYTIME YOU DIE!

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport After Death
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Then take the coords of where you end up in Yanille.

Go to client.java, search for those coords.

and change them!

(That being the easy way.)

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport After Death
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Oh sorry i may not have explained well enough.

Ill give an example,

When your in castle wars and you die i want to teleport back to waiting area not back to yanille.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport After Death
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

i believe yu just search the coords in the client.java OR player.java then change em t what you’d like. I may be wrong since i’ve never changed my starting plac in like a year…

Read full topic
